installInstructionSection:
This Legal Landing page will contain the following documents that can be downloaded:
- SLT for Microsoft Invoicing
- 3rd Party Notices
- Other Terms and Conditions
These files can be downloade by selecting the file or files that you would like to downloade from the dropdown above.
To Download do the following:
1) Click the Download button (above).
2) Select the files that you would like to download.
3) Click Next.
4) Select to Open or Save the document.
5) Go to the location that you saved the document and view
